actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to extend the United States Commission on Civil Rights.
short_title: Civil Rights Commission Temporary Reauthorization Act of 1989
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Civil Rights Commission Temporary Reauthorization Act of 1989 - Amends the United States Commission on Civil Rights Act of 1983 to authorize appropriations through FY 1990. Extends the termination of the Commission to May 31, 1990. Requires the staff director of the Commission to be appointed by the Commission. (Current law requires appointment by the President with the concurrence of a majority of the Commission.)

titles.title: Civil Rights Commission Temporary Reauthorization Act of 1989
A bill to extend the United States Commission on Civil Rights.
